identificationModule.briefTitle: Japan Post Marketing Surveillance of the GORE速 CARDIOFORM Septal Occluder
identificationModule.officialTitle: Post Marketing Surveillance of the GORE速 CARDIOFORM Septal Occluder

descriptionModule.briefSummary: The purpose of this post-marketing surveillance is to evaluate the effectiveness and safety of GORE速 CARDIOFORM Septal Occluder under the post-marketing setting in Japan.

interventions.name: GORE速 CARDIOFORM Septal Occluder
interventions.description: Patients for whom the device is used (implanted or used by not implanted) during the enrollment period of this post-marketing surveillance will be considered eligible for the study

primaryOutcomes.description: PFO closure success will be defined as the number of cases which achieve effective PFO closure at 12 months post-initial procedure out of those which complete the PFO closure evaluation under Trans-Thoracic Echocardiography (TTE) with bubbles. PFO effective closure will be defined as the number of bubbles confirmed to be less than 20 (\<20).

primaryOutcomes.measure: Rate of Conversion to surgical procedure
primaryOutcomes.description: Rate of post-procedure conversion to surgical procedure will be calculated.

primaryOutcomes.measure: Incidence rate of post-procedure ischemic stroke events
primaryOutcomes.description: Incidence rate of post-procedure ischemic stroke will be calculated. Additionally, those stroke events will be evaluated by Kapan-Meier plot.

Device success will be calculated by the number of cases with successful device implant during the initial procedure and later follow-ups out of those which underwent the transcatheter PFO closure procedure.

primaryOutcomes.measure: Incidence rate of post-procedure adverse events and/or device issues
primaryOutcomes.description: Incidence rate of adverse events and/or device issues collected through each follow-up period will be calculated.

primaryOutcomes.measure: Incidence rate of device- and procedure-related events within 30 days post procedure
primaryOutcomes.description: Incidence rate of adverse events and/or device issues which are defined as device- or procedure-related within 30 days post procedure will be calculated.

otherOutcomes.measure: Incidence rate of post-procedure Atrial fibrillation
otherOutcomes.description: Rate of post-procedure AF will be calculated during each follow-up period.

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Diagnosed with cryptogenic stroke (including transient ischemic attack with positive head imaging findings)
* Diagnosed with a PFO
* Note: Additional Inclusion Criteria may apply

Exclusion Criteria:

* N/A
eligibilityModule.studyPopulation: Patients who have had a cryptogenic stroke (including transient ischemic attack with positive head imaging findings) with possible involvement of patent foramen ovale (PFO) due to a presumed paradoxical embolism.

browseBranches.name: Diseases and Abnormalities at or Before Birth
